response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value. It comes with a range of features designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Given its quality and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $120 for this product. I believe this price reflects its true value and provides a fair deal for both of us. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further or making an offer.", "product_price": 120}
